title: Jurgen Klopp warns Liverpool might have to pull out of Carabao Cup if fixtures are not rescheduled sensibly
text:
Jurgen Klopp has threatened to withdraw Liverpool from the Carabao Cup if their quarter-final tie is not sensibly rescheduled.

After seeing his side seal their spot with an extraordinary victory over Arsenal, Klopp threw further participation in doubt because of Liverpool’s involvement in the World Club championships.

Liverpool are in Qatar between December 17-21 - the week when the Carabao Cup quarter-finals are held.

Given Liverpool’s Premier League priorities - a fixture with West Ham has already been postponed because of the competition - Klopp is in no mood to compromise title ambitions if he thinks the demands on his players are too much.

“We will not be the victim of this problem,” said Klopp.

“We play tonight, we wanted to win it, we did that, and if they don't find a proper date for us, then we cannot play the next round and whoever is our opponent will go through. Or Arsenal play them.
description: Jurgen Klopp has threatened to withdraw Liverpool from the Carabao Cup if their quarter-final tie is not sensibly rescheduled.
